name: LitMan Item Stack & Container Size
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 622975.39737.[/quote]

[b]Item stack increased 10 times & Containers Size increased 10 times.[/b]

Does not Stacks Armor, Weapons and Pet Items.

Best used with "LitMan Increased Weight".

Does not work with "LitMan Item Stack" and "LitMan Container Size". 

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/nWaPQqe

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you would like to Donate feel free to do so on Paypal https://www.paypal.me/kasperaitis
